thread.title: Canadian photographer captures photos of windswept dogs
thread.title_full: Canadian photographer captures photos of windswept dogs

title: Canadian photographer captures photos of windswept dogs
text: Ruff hair day? Photographer captures the comical reactions of dozens of dogs as their fur is blown about by a large fan The picture series, called Blow, demonstrates the dogs' varying reactions to being subjected to wind Some appear to relish the moment - basking in front of the bright yellow fan - while others tried to take shelter from the blowing air or confront the source Pet photographer Illona Haus, from Ontario, Canada, said the project took three years to collate and was inspired by her own dog Merrick Rather than focusing solely on the dogs' hair, she said she sought 'engagement and individual personality' from the pictures Published: 18:35 GMT, 31 January 2017 | Updated: 22:58 GMT, 31 January 2017 307 shares
